original_body_lines: The Hi Life exhibition was unveiled today at the Cinnamon Lakeside in Colombo with a rare collection of haute couture from India’s top designers. In this exhibition there are weaves' traditional techniques with contemporary styles creating unique and stunning pieces that are coveted around the world. The exhibition has many stalls selling and displaying designer wear, jewelry, accessories, luxury, home décor and many more. It will continue until April 18. Pix by Nimalsiri Edirisinghe
